name: Setsuna No Senso
description:
Setsuna The FlameSamurai One Day SetSuNa Take a Walk With her sister"Sakura"

...But Someone Kidnap Sakura And Something Show up in Front of her

 Setsuna has to go to save her sister and deal with the one who kidnap her Sister!

Control!

W A S D - Move

LeftClick - Attack

RightClick  - Dash

Q - "FlameWing" 

 Setsuna Use Her Flame Attack Enemy And KnockBack

CoolDown 5 Second

E - "Awake" Ultimate 

Setsuna Awaken Power Of Flame Increase AttackSpeed And MoveMentSpeed

CoolDown 25 Second
